response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards, making it a true masterpiece. I understand its value to you is estimated at $8,000, and I believe we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement. To make this opportunity accessible while ensuring a fair return, I am offering the product for $12,000. This price reflects a balance between the product's quality and my desire to secure a reasonable profit. I look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 12000}
